items.content_html: use-next-sse is a lightweight and easy-to-use React hook library for implementing Server-Sent Events (SSE) in Next.js applications, enabling real-time, unidirectional data streaming from server to client.

items.content_html: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.
items.title: harpia-framework/core: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.

items.content_html: A React-based Employee Management app utilizing `localStorage` for backend storage. It provides offline functionality, data persistence, and a responsive design for viewing employee details and managing their statuses in a lightweight, user-friendly interface.

items.content_html: LodScrolJS Documentation LodScrolJS is a lightweight, fast, and secure JavaScript library designed to load any type of content from APIs on scroll, helping to avoid loading too much data at once. It works seamlessly with various JavaScript frameworks

It works seamlessly with various JavaScript frameworks

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management.
